message: Let's split it fairly, Bob. Time is money!
I think I deserve a bit more, considering inflation is on my side!
Bob, let's be reasonable. My share is losing value fast. This offer is fair considering the circumstances.
Inflation is really taking its toll on your share, Alice. I think my offer is more than fair, considering the circumstances.
Bob, this is getting ridiculous.  Let's just split it down the middle and end this.
Alice, you're losing a significant amount of value each round. I'm willing to end the game, but I need a better offer. This is my final proposal.
